payload.name: record-replay-debugging
payload.title: Record/replay debugging: capture minimal deterministic traces
payload.formal: reproduce by recording nondeterministic inputs and replaying under deterministic execution.
payload.apm2_mapping: the ledger + CAS is the natural record/replay substrate. The missing piece is **tool determinism receipts**: store tool request, tool response hash, environment snapshot hash (hermeticity), and attach to work/gate receipts. If an action can’t be replayed from receipts, it is not fully verified.
